description:
This is a Vim Emulation layer for Visual Studio 2010 and
above.  It integrates the familiar key binding experience of Vim directly
into Visual Studio's editor.

The full source for this project and issue tracking is available on GitHub.
http://github.com/jaredpar/VsVim/

FAQ Available: http://wiki.github.com/jaredpar/VsVim/faq

Release Notes: https://github.com/jaredpar/VsVim/wiki/Release-Notes

Please feel free to send any questions, comments or bug reports to @jaredpar on
twitter.  Happy Vimming!

Note: This extension is being released by Jared, not by Microsoft.
summary: VIM emulation layer for Visual Studio
author: JaredPar MSFT (Jared Parsons)
